website_summaries.verdict: This popular model offers a sleek design for customers seeking a durable, no-nonsense mirror.
pros: Option to buy in a smaller size and different colors
Reinforced with solid wood for sturdiness and stability
Able to hang both horizontally and vertically
Many buyers raved about the company's incredible customer service
cons: Some owners claimed their mirror arrived broken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: The mirror arrived promptly and in excellent condition. It was very well packaged. The style, quality, and size are all as expected. We easily and quickly hung the mirror horizontally with the hardware provided, and it looks just right in our bathroom. It also can be hung vertically. Excellent customer service and product. I would order again, if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is stylish and heavy duty--large hanging hooks included (no mollies required). Doesn't seem to give warped or distorted image. Good quality for the price vs. other full length mirrors we had looked at.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyK

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and is a lovely addition to my daugher's room.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mirror for a restroom at our office. I wanted something clean and simple but durable and low maintenance. I ordered the Hamilton Hills one after comparing the details of a couple of different models. It arrived quickly and I was really surprised at the quality of the mirror. I wasn't expecting much as its a quite simple design but it certainly exceeded my expectations. The backing is wood and heavy. The frame is metal and nicely wrapped around a perfect glass mirror. There was no distortion or problems with the glass. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full Wall Length Mirror/Brushed Gold
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Mirror. As described. Brushed Gold finish Heavy Sturdy Securely Packed. I have been looking for a Full Length Mirror & most of the ones I have found "price points" way too expensive. Thank you Hamilton Hills I highly recommend this Company. Quality was above what I was expecting & the price point get's a 10+! Thanks again I will enjoy my new mirror for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mom/Wife/Family First

customer_reviews.title: Great size & color.
customer_reviews.text: The right color & size for my bathroom. I was struggling to find a gold mirror that matched my Moen Brushed Gold fixtures. (This is as good as it gets & it looks great) The mirror is a good weight, not too heavy.. some of the other ones I ordered were extremely heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Good

customer_reviews.title: So nice to see a company is TRULY interested in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are lovely. They are well made and exactly what we were looking for in our bathrooms after the remodel. I was also impressed with Hamilton Hills customer service. Prior to the mirrors being delivered I was contacted with a number to call in case there was a problem with the mirrors or if they were delivered broken etc. So nice to see a company is TRULY interested in the customer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Darling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It's very simple (obviously), but sometimes simple is just what you need. I think it goes nicely with my lights. It's a great size, and the finish is beautiful. I ordered the polished silver. I was nervous because we have polished chrome fixtures in our bathroom, but it goes nicely with them. I would say that it's not a true polished nickel, but that it leans more towards a polished chrome color, honestly I feel like this could work with the nickel or chrome fixtures. Nicely packaged upon arrival, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror arrived on schedule, and in perfect condition. The mirror is very well built, and solid. The picture does a decent job, but the real thing is actually quite impressive to look at. It has clean mitered stainless corners that fit tightly together, the anchors points on the back are solidly attached and the overall feel and look is high quality! I would order again if I need another mirror.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great value & easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other sources this mirror is an excellent value. I was worried about shipping a mirror by UPS but it arrived undamaged. It has preinstalled rings on the back to hang it either vertically or horizontally and it comes with appropriate wall hangers. So it was really easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Byram

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. The metal frame is good quality with a nice subtle patina. I have no need for another but would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Redlocke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quality product - exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, quality product - exactly as advertised. Fast delivery, good customer service. If you're looking for a good looking, functional and well made mirror, this one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jenel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: After looking for far too long for the perfect mirror, I found it. Thank you! It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: IAAZ

customer_reviews.title: High quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is such a solid mirror. The size is substantial and makes our powder room bathroom seem larger. The frame is super high quality and is the perfect brass / gold tone. Seems like something you’d find at restoration hardware or rejuvenation. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lake

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and east to Install
customer_reviews.text: The mirror exceeded my expectations. It is very well made. I worried that it would be difficult to hang but I it comes with everything needed, including hooks. I was able to hang the mirror by myself and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror - Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror so that I had a full length option in my bedroom. The mirror is basic and beautiful and is mounted out of the way. It was easy to install and looks great. I was concerned about ordering a mirror online because I was afraid that it would get broken in transit. I needn't have worried. It came through unscathed. It was well packaged and arrived only two days after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Leta Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: High quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Was easy to install and looks amazing in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: amp2008

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer a thinner mirror but....
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer a thinner mirror but overall im happy with the purchase and the quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirror
customer_reviews.text: By far the nicest commercial bathroom mirrors we've purchased (for our school). Excellent quality, easier to hang than others, and fantastic customer service/follow-up. Ordered 6 - expected at least one to arrive broken (as has been our experience with other brands from Amazon in the past), but these were packaged well and all arrived intact.
customer_reviews.author: sjs

customer_reviews.title: Full Length Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy and packed well. Arrived in excellent condition. Looksgreat haging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Boas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Finish!!
customer_reviews.text: This finish on this mirror is beautiful, I absolutely love it! It was also very well packaged for shipping. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: April415

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and constructed well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and constructed well. I'd buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Sleek and Modern
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mirror for a new bathroom in my basement. Sleek and modern look that we wanted. Comes well packaged and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, is forever sturdy, and very good, clear reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gerat mirror and great purchase. It is heavy duty and the mirror itself is very good quality. I love the stability it has and it was super easy to hang:)!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Mirror !!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece at a great price. I was looking at a very similar mirror at RH and couldn't justify the price and this mirror looks just as good. I would highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought 18 of these for the bathrooms in an office building. They’re sturdy, good looking and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful design and quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction, used in a bathroom renovation. Wonderful follow up from this family business to ensure we were happy, very nice personal touch on a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Runkel

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made & Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long mirror to hang horizontally in a narrow space above my new vanity. I Love ❤️ the new mirror from you all. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror! Exactly as promised. Not a cheap, lightweight mirror. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RMN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3 of these for restaurant restroom. They are very heavy, nice quality, look great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, VA

customer_reviews.title: ... back of the door (solid core door) it looks great, it is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Put it in my moms bathroom on the back of the door (solid core door) it looks great, it is very heavy, I wouldn’t attempt to put on a hollow core door, and it needs good anchors or attached to a stud on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary, clean lines, easy to hang.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my master bath remodel. Came with all hardware needed to hang. Simple to hang straight and level. Love the finished look!
customer_reviews.author: JODI R MAHONEY

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful mirror and was packaged by people who care about ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mirror and was packaged by people who care about the product and how it is delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy installation. Since the side of the mirror is very visible when entering our bathroom, we used anchor bolts instead of the supplied hooks. This made for an even cleaner look.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for antique gold frame this is the mirror to buy
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect for what I am looking for. Very pretty and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these mirrors and received so many ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these mirrors and received so many compliments . I wanted to buy 1 more but not available.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mirror, a bit heavy but very pleased with the quality + appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the mirror and it’s nice quality but I just think it was a little overpriced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was in between a lot of mirrors and I am glad I opted for this one! It looks great in my bedroom. I have it leaning up against the wall & I love the way it looks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made and easy to hang. Love the look. Reflection is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install all hardware included
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted and perfect size mirror. So easy to install!!
customer_reviews.author: gshahzada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and packed very well for shipping so the mirror arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: PatColum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality with good price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of mirror is really good! looks beautiful and easy installation! Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: XUELIANG MEI

customer_reviews.title: Too much for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Could get one at Walmart for cheaper that’s bigger and cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Collison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. It arrived sooner than expected. I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mkm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the mirrors for the store's restrooms. They were exactly as described and look great.
customer_reviews.author: JBR All Pets, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Clear Reflection
customer_reviews.text: I love there is no distortion. Are there clips to mount the bottom of the mirror to the door?
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E. Zenga

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Perfect gold color. A bit pricey but exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: jordan lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Terrific company
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was exactly as advertised. Very well constructed and tremendous value for the quality. Terrific experience.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: a simple mirror...
customer_reviews.text: this mirror is okay, however, if you're looking for a more decorative mirror, with a bit of flair, this is not the mirror for you. It's a little too commercial looking, and would look better hanging in a McDonald's bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: DianaTheHuntress

customer_reviews.title: As Described. Nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic metal frame mirror and this did the job. Great mirror, good quality, fast shipping, good company.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, very heavy wall mirror provides solid reflections for humans and evil queens
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something sturdy and I found it in this commercial full-length mirror. It was not cheap, but it is solid. The cost of solidity is weight and this mirror is quite heavy. After years of flimsy dime-store wall mirrors, we finally have one that provides a non-warped, smooth and perfect reflection (unless you are a vampire). The provided wall hook is adequate although some have complained that it seems a tad small considering the weight of this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Zac Imboden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bedroom or Closet Wall Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Do you have an empty wall in your walk in closet, consider this mirror. It is easy to hang especially if you can locate a stud to nail into but the quality and appearance of this mirror is first class. When they say "commercial grade" they are not kidding, buy with confidence, it is a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: jockbroker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I like the mirror. It is exactly as featured on Amazon. I won't know the full effect until my carpenter is finished with the barn door that I have asked him to make. The barn door will be solid wood on one side and will have the mirror inserted into the side that will show inside the room when the door is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J from Estero

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Before it even arrived the owner reached out to me to assure me that if there were any problems or questions they would be happy to work with me to my satisfaction. Talk about great customer service. I am very happy with the product and the buying experience. Somewhat costly but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great look for a modern bathroom. Packaged well, arrived un damaged. Manufacturer was very attentive. Sent update email when it shipped and provided feedback options if anything wasn't as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I'm not happy about is that the price has dropped about $30 ...
customer_reviews.text: 100% as described. Simple, classy, high-quality. The only thing I'm not happy about is that the price has dropped about $30 in the couple months since I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and nice quality mirror. Packaging also comes with brackets. Great price too. Mirror was packaged very well so it arrived without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: JoTo

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror & easy to hang.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! It's not like the flimsy ones from the discount store. It was easy to hang, although I wish the company had supplied the actual wall hangers. My heavy duty picture hangers worked good so I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern look
customer_reviews.text: Super solid, nice mirror. It looks like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: DEGREENE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Arrived in perfect condition due to good packaging. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Kanoa Helms

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror, just what our master bath needed! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is heavy duty, well made, easy to install (just two hooks nailed in the wall), and fits perfectly in narrow space.
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Frame is beautiful in my daughter's room. We looked at West Elm and mirrors there were about $100 more. Definitely glad we found this one!
customer_reviews.author: J. Driver

customer_reviews.title: But it
customer_reviews.text: Hung in my bedroom. Beautifully packaged. Arrived in one piece & easy to hang
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and matches the stainless look in the restroom
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what we needed for our public restroom. Sturdy and matches the stainless look in the restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Family guy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I loved the mirror but it arrive broken. I will reorder and try again and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: closetisfull

product_meta.title: Commercial Restroom Rectangular Wall Mirror | Contemporary Industrial Strength | Brushed Metal Silver Rectangle Mirrored Glass | Vanity, Bedroom or Restroom Horizontal & Vertical (24" x 36")
product_meta.description: Size:24" x 36"| Color:SilverOur commercial grade industrial rectangle mirror is perfect for hundreds of styles and locations. Whether you are looking for a public restroom or bathroom or a powder room, dining or living room in your home, our sturdy reinforced rectangular plate glass mirror is the perfect solution. The metal frame is 1" wide by 1" deep and surrounds the clean flat plate glass. Our mirror comes secured to a solid wood backing to add stability and prevent distortion or warping. The wood backing includes our pre-installed slimline 1/4 inch hanging hardware hooks for hanging your mirror in both a horizontal or vertical fashion. The large rectangular portion is surrounded by a simple yet tough brushed metal frame. The backing comes with small bumpers to gently protect the wall and compensate for the hanging hardware. Our commercial mirror offers a clean sophisticated look, while still offering security and support. We stand by our products and your happiness. USA Company with 3 Generations of Family Values.
feature_bullets: SOPHISTICATED DESIGN: One of our Best Sellers, this simple 24" x 36" industrial commercial grade mirror is a favorite. A sleek, modern, clean brushed metal 1 inch edge. Backed with our solid core wood reinforcement to add stability and longevity for high traffic areas or in your home. Avoid the warping and distortion found in cheaper brands.

SAFE AND EASY TO INSTALL: Our authentic silver backed glass is covered by the metal frame offering a beautiful finished appearance. Glass is securely mounted to solid core wood. All mirrors come with reinforced D-ring hanging clips as well as wall hardware and screws to hang both horizontally or vertically.

3 GENERATIONS OF EXCELLENCE: Our family has been manufacturing and producing mirrors for over 3 generations. We stand by the quality of our product and your experience. A family owned business with simple principles. Affordable quality from an American company.

EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY: We use premium materials not found in other lesser quality imitation mirrors you will see. Our mirrors are made to strict trade-secret standards and pass a rigorous 8 point inspection. Every mirror comes with our certification of authenticity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
